message: Can I ask you guys a question, How many developers here practiced scientific computing (developing for scientific purposes)... I mean professionally ??

data.message: What about you tell us the problem and let us try to help you :)
just want to know how much Egyptians involved on developing for scientific software companies .. is this branch interest somebody ??

I personally use scientific Methods for Writing Documentation and Specs for my daily Projects: http://www.sciencebuddies.org/science-fair-projects/project_scientific_method.shtml which is now becoming a must if you are wrking in our company :)
That's good but not what i mean, i mean developers interested on developing science or engineering software, mathmatics, simulation, industrical software..
we have a team in Intel called Memic, A research team combining software engineers & communication engineers & interested in 5G wireless communication
Would writing scientific computing software for my phd thesis count?
